official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to State educational agencies to help control violence in the schools of local educational agencies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Safe Schools Act - Directs the Commissioner of Education to provide financial assistance to State educational agencies for fiscal years 1979-1983 in order to provide services and activities designed to rehabilitate chronically maladjusted students. Stipulates that the Federal share of such programs shall be 50 percent for each fiscal year.
